title: How dirty and unhygienic is going to the bathroom actually? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh yes, you're right. It's just so dirty, all that emptying your bowels thing and just think of all that waste water that comes out of you. Dirty things people, I guess that's why they put the flush it away idea. But I guess if the near thought of all that gunk in one small room is a bit much and I guess it is to some then maybe let's just forget about that small room and just do it on the lounge floor or we could be civilised and get a big litter tray like the cat has. That's much less dirty you must agree…………….
I would say not that dirty and unhygienic. I'm doing it for 32 years and nothing happend to me. My grandma is doing it for 88 years and nothing happend to her.
